name: Lizardfolk Render

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
text: The render has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Hold Breath
text: The render can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The render makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its bite.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Rend the Field (Recharge 5-6)
text: The render makes a claw attack against each creature of its choice within 10 feet of it. A creature hit by this attack must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

description:
Filled with the primal magic of Semuanya, the lizardfolk render undergoes terrifying changes during a dayslong ritual performed by a shaman. As seen in Danger at Dunwater, the render's claws grow long and hard as steel, its frame enlarges, and its temperament becomes even more ferocious.
Source: Ghosts of Saltmarsh p. 241, Essentials Kit: Storm Lord's Wrath, Infernal Machine Rebuild
